channel.title: Posts on Website of Fergus Fettes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Website of Fergus Fettes

item.title: Longer Post
item.description: Hello world! I’m continuing my slightly anachronistic (or preposterous) tour of Web publishing. I started with a threejs megaproject, and now I’ve travelled all the way back (via simple paperjs attempts) to a static http website.

item.title: Alacritty Ascii
item.description: Notes: ssh localhost vlc -I dummy ~/films/film.choice is interactive, ssh localhost vlc ~/films/film.choice is not. Asciinema cast attached1. (https://asciinema.org/a/GVzf6Uw8ObM1bAlJJ60sHZ20r) ↩︎
